ModuleDescription: This module deals with specialized topics focusing on the state as an actor, institution, and/or arena for politics as well as related issues pertaining to globalization, citizenship, nation-building, war, democracy, welfare and social justice.
Prerequisite: Cohort 2011 and before: Completed 80 MCs, including 28 MCs in SC with a minimum CAP of 3.50 or be on the Honours track. Cohort 2012 onwards: Completed 80 MCs, including 28 MCs in SC with a minimum CAP of 3.20 or be on the Honours track.
Preclusion: SC4215 Issues in State and Society
